Game randomly uninstalled itself and now it won't let me redownload it, because it keep ssaying that it's going to takew a year to download and i have good wifi. this game is fucking ruined. After is was good for so long. im so glad that valve made this game free, now i get to play with people who cheat, and people who abandon matches because they think it's funny, and even better, get rids of the bots that you are supposed to get when you kick a teammate who is griefing, or a teammate who is a troller leaves. love how you managed to ruin a game after it was perfectly fine for years!

Of the 1055 hours I've spent on Steam, 1051 have been spent on CS:GO so yeah, I'd recommend it to others.  Unless they're concerned about getting hooked (addicted?) to a FPS that keeps them coming back for the heart-pounding competition, hopelessly honed skills that never come, sheer triumph, endless frustration, and complete exhaustion.  If they don't want that, then stay away.
It's a pretty good fps, unless you're some kinda fps snob
